C

canPlay() - Method in class controller.K3
This function test if the active player can play.
cardLayout - Variable in class view.UI
cardLayout is the CardLayout use to change between the parameterPanel and the GamePanel.
centerCardLayout - Variable in class view.UI
centerCardLayout is the CardLayout that contains initPanel, menuPanel and mainPanel.
centerFrame - Variable in class view.UI
centerFrame is the JFrame of that contains centerCardLayout, it is in the center of the gamePanel.
changeFinishButton() - Method in class view.UI
This function change the finish button between the 2 player panel.
changePlayer() - Method in class view.InitPanel
This function change the player that need to create his pyramid.
closeWindow() - Method in class view.UI
Close the main screen
colorblind - Static variable in class controller.K3
colorblind indicates if colorblind mode is enabled.
colorblindCheckBox - Variable in class view.UI
colorblindCheckBox is the check box to check if colorblind mod is active.
colorEnum - Variable in class game.Tile
colorEnum is the color link with the colorSwing.
ColorEnum() - Constructor for enum game.Tile.ColorEnum
 
colorSwing - Variable in class game.Tile
colorSwing is the real color to get it easily in the UI.
contains(Coordinates) - Method in class game.ApproachableTile
This function check if a given coordinate is approachable.
controller - package controller
 
coordinate - Static variable in class controller.K3
coordinate is an int used to keep in the memory the choice of the player on one panel.
Coordinates - Class in game
 
Coordinates(int, int) - Constructor for class game.Coordinates
This constructor only define y and x.
coordinatesMemory(Coordinates) - Method in class controller.K3
This function set index.
createPyramid() - Method in class player.AIRandom
This function generate a random pyramid and create it.
createPyramid() - Method in class player.Player
This function is unused for a real player.
